誎字的基本解释

誎
cù
促。
从。
饰。

誎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cù］
［《廣韻》七玉切，入燭，清。］
(1)谨敕之貌。
(2)作人名用字。宋有赵希誎，见《宋史·宗室世系表四》。

誎字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　誎； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1161第23
【唐韻】桑谷切【集韻】蘇谷切，?音速。【說文】餔旋促也。【廣雅】誎促也。【類篇】飾也。【佩觿集】衒也。　又人名。希誎、崇誎，見【宋史·宗室表】。　又【廣韻】七玉切。【集韻】趨玉切，?音促。義同。　又【玉篇】從也。

考證：〔【廣雅】督促也。〕　謹按廣雅原文誎督二字爲促非訓誎督促也，謹照原書文義改作誎促也。
誎字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
誎字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Yin
cù
promote.
From.
Decorated.
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cù］
["Guangyun" seven jade cuts, into candles, clear. ]
(1) Kindly look.
(2) Use words for names. There was Zhao Xixin in the Song Dynasty, see "Song History·Clan Lineage Table IV".
Yin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【You Ji 1】【Words Department】　誎; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 1161 to 23
[Tang Yun] Sang Gu cut [Ji Yun] Su Gu cut, the speed of sound. [Said the text] Catering and promoting also. [Guang Ya] You urge also. 【Classes】Decoration also. 【Peiyou Collection】Hyun Ye.　Another name. For Xixin and Chongxin, see [Song History·Clan List].　[Guangyun] Seven jade cut. [Jiyun] Tend to jade and cut, and the sound is fast. The same meaning.　[Jade articles] Cong Ye. Research: [[Guangya] Supervise. 〕　I would like to follow the original text of Guangya to promote non-executive supervision, and I would like to change it according to the original text.
